subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Lieuwe Westra came from behind to win the seventh stage of the Critérium du Dauphiné in France while Chris Froome, the defending champion, lost the overall lead to Alberto Contador.
snippet: Lieuwe Westra came from behind to win the seventh stage of the Critérium du Dauphiné in France while Chris Froome, the defending champion, lost the overall lead to Alberto Contador.
